SELECT o.o_number, o.o_date, o.o_count, o.o_status, b.b_title, u.u_name, b.b_price FROM Orders o JOIN Book b ON o.b_code = b.b_code JOIN User u ON u.u_id = o.u_id WHERE o_status LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY o_number DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}
SELECT b_img, b_title, b_price, c_count, u_id, b.b_code FROM Book b JOIN Cart c ON b.b_code = c.b_code;
SELECT c.c_count, c.u_id, c.b_code, b.b_title, b.b_price, b.b_img FROM Cart c JOIN Book b ON c.b_code = b.b_code JOIN User u ON u.u_id = c.u_id WHERE c.u_id = #{u_id} AND c.b_code = #{b_code};
SELECT u_email, u_address, u_phone, u_name FROM User WHERE u_id = #{u_id}
